Loader.text: The party you have been waiting for is finally here

Rsvp.text: Please let us know if you'll be able to join us by clicking on the RSVP button here on the side and filling in the form by February 15th, 2025.

question1.question: What is the dress code?
question1.answer: All are welcome to wear whatever they feel most comfortable in, Zane says, “no Crocs.” However, guests are strongly encouraged to wear cocktail attire.

question2.question: Are children invited?
question2.answer: While we love little ones, unfortunately we are only able to accommodate the children in the wedding party at our celebration.

question3.question: What is the dress code?
question3.answer: All are welcome to wear whatever they feel most comfortable in, Zane says, “no Crocs.” However, guests are strongly encouraged to wear cocktail attire.

Playlist.title: Playlist
Playlist.text: Enjoy the playlist your family & friends specially curated for you
